content: the district court in ljubljana made a decision on december 20 2021 in a legal case involving the division of assets of a deceased person the court determined that the deceased persons estate includes real estate and unpaid pension benefits with a total value of 129000 euros there are three heirs involved and originally each heir was entitled to 13 of the assets however due to the death of the widow one heir now receives 23 of the assets another heir waived their share and the third heir still receives 13 of the assets the court applied the inheritance act specifically article 11 in making this decision the court also identified the deceased persons heirs and their entitlement to a hereditary share the court made decisions regarding the distribution of the estate and the granting of certain rights to specific individuals the court explained that a deed prepared by the deceased cannot be considered in the inheritance agreement the net value of the estate is estimated to be 12990000 eur and the court fees and funeral costs must be paid the text also provides instructions for lodging an appeal including the deadline required documents and payment of court fees the text is dated december 20 2021 in ljubljana
